data.message: I have a question Facebook. Why if I want to install your facebook app on my phone do you have to have my acceptance to Device and app history, Identity, Contacts/Calendar, Location, SMS, Phone, Photos/Media/Files, Camera/Microphone, Wi-Fi connections, Device ID & Call Information and Other??? What exactly is other??? Why do you need all this just so I can use your app. This is an invasion of privacy! My microphone? Do you listen to people's conversations? I want to know why do you need all this information please! Please tell me. Thankyou!

replies.message: Facebook why do you reply on everyone else and not me? I feel you are ignoring me. I would appreciate a repsponse too please. Thankyou!
No reply from Facebook is still an answer. The answer is what  Ely Ewan said is correct!

Hi MariaIsabel Villalobos Hackney We realize that some of these permissions sound scary, so we’d like to  provide more info about how we use them. Visit our Help Center for a list of some of the permissions we request for the Facebook app, as well  as an example of how we use each one: https://www.facebook.com/help/210676372433246 -Ryan
Ok. So facebook why do you need our  microphone? I did not see that information posted. And what does Other mean? Thankyou
Still waiting for your reply Facebook. Thankyou!
FB has a calling feature ... thus needs your mic.  Just relax and hit "Accept".
They are scary, they don't just "sound scary."
